```{r DateEntryAndProcessing, echo=FALSE}
## ("Data\\defense_summary_SP_CompetitionHistoryBucketSubCustomerRegime.csv", sep = """) Neither the computer nor myself can find this file in (K:\\2007-01 PROFESSIONAL SERVICES\\R scripts and data\\Data)

VehicleRegime  <- read.csv(
    unz("data\\Defense_Summary_SP_CompetitionVehicleHistoryBucketSubCustomerRegime.zip",
        "Defense_Summary_SP_CompetitionVehicleHistoryBucketSubCustomerRegime.csv"),
#     "Data\\defense_summary_SP_CompetitionHistoryBucketSubCustomerRegime.csv",
    header = TRUE, sep = ",", dec = ".", strip.white = TRUE, 
    na.strings = c("NULL","NA",""),
    stringsAsFactors = TRUE
    )

VehicleRegime<-apply_lookups(Path,VehicleRegime)
names(VehicleRegime)
str(VehicleRegime)
VehicleRegime$USDATL<-factor(VehicleRegime$USDATL,levels=c("GANSLER+","ALDRIDGE","WYNNE","KRIEG","YOUNG", "CARTER","KENDALL" ),ordered=TRUE )
VehicleRegime<-subset(VehicleRegime,USDATL %in% c("YOUNG","CARTER","KENDALL"))


Coloration<-read.csv(
    paste(Path,"Lookups\\","lookup_coloration.csv",sep=""),
    header=TRUE, sep=",", na.strings="", dec=".", strip.white=TRUE, 
    stringsAsFactors=FALSE
    )

Coloration<-ddply(Coloration
                  , c(.(R), .(G), .(B))
                  , transform
                  , ColorRGB=as.character(
                      if(min(is.na(c(R,G,B)))) {NA} 
                      else {rgb(max(R),max(G),max(B),max=255)}
                      )
                  )

# debug(LatticePercentLineWrapper)
VehicleRegime$Graph<-TRUE

VehicleRegime$SignedQuarter<-as.Date(paste(as.numeric(format(VehicleRegime$SignedMonth, "%Y"))+
                                                  floor(as.numeric(format(VehicleRegime$SignedMonth,"%m"))/10),
    (floor((as.numeric(format(VehicleRegime$SignedMonth, "%m"))-1)/3)*3+4) %% 12,
    1
      ,sep="-"),"%Y-%m-%d")-1

VehicleRegime$SubCustomer.component<-droplevels(VehicleRegime$SubCustomer.component)
VehicleRegime$SubCustomer.component<-factor(VehicleRegime$SubCustomer.component,
                                               levels=c("Army","Navy","Air Force","DLA",
                                                        "MDA","MilitaryHealth","Additional DoD Components"),
                                               labels=c("Army","Navy","Air Force","DLA",
                                                        "MDA","Military\nHealth","Additional\nDoD\nComponents"),
                                               ordered=TRUE)
                                                                                               
```


```{r VehicleATLregime}
ATLregimeFYear<-aggregate(VehicleRegime$Obligation.2014
                          , by=list(VehicleRegime$Fiscal.Year,
                                    #                                                   VehicleRegime$SubCustomer.component,
                                    VehicleRegime$USDATL)
                          ,FUN = "sum"
                          ,na.rm =TRUE
                          )

names(ATLregimeFYear)<-c("Fiscal.Year","USDATL","AnnualRegimeObligations")


VehicleUSDATL<-subset(VehicleRegime,join(VehicleRegime,ATLregimeFYear)$AnnualRegimeObligations>=50)


ATLregimeDetails<-data.frame(USDATL= 'GANSLER+',
                             StartDate=as.Date('1997/11/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                             EndDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'ALDRIDGE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2003/05/22' ,format='%Y/%m/%d') ))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'WYNNE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2003/05/23' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2005/06/05' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'KRIEG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2005/06/06' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2007/07/19' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'YOUNG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2007/07/20' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2009/04/26',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'CARTER',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2011/11/02',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'KENDALL' ,
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2011/11/03',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=max(VehicleRegime$SignedQuarter)))


ATLregimeDetails$StartFiscalYear<-ymd(paste(year(ATLregimeDetails$StartDate)+
                                                ifelse(month(ATLregimeDetails$StartDate)<10,-1,0)
                                            ,"-10-1",sep=""))


VehicleUSDATL<-join(VehicleUSDATL,ATLregimeDetails,match="first")

VehicleUSDATL$Fiscal.Year[VehicleUSDATL$Fiscal.Year>VehicleUSDATL$EndDate&
                                      VehicleUSDATL$SignedMonth<=VehicleUSDATL$EndDate]<-
    VehicleUSDATL$EndDate[VehicleUSDATL$Fiscal.Year>VehicleUSDATL$EndDate&
                                      VehicleUSDATL$SignedMonth<=VehicleUSDATL$EndDate]

VehicleUSDATL$Fiscal.Year[VehicleUSDATL$Fiscal.Year<VehicleUSDATL$StartDate]<-
    VehicleUSDATL$StartDate[VehicleUSDATL$Fiscal.Year<VehicleUSDATL$StartDate]

```

```{r VehicleUSDATLmonthlyComponents}        
    
png(
    paste( "Output\\Vehicle\\",paste("DoD_components"
                                         ,"Obligation_2014"
                                         ,"Vehicle_sum"
                                         ,"USDATL"
                                         ,"6monthMovingAverage"
                                         ,sep="_"
                                         )
           ,".png"
           , sep=""
           )
    , type="cairo"
    , width=7.5
    , height=10
    , units='in'
    , pointsize=12
    , res=150
    )

# debug(LatticePercentLineWrapper)

VehicleGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
    "Contract Vehicle"
    ,""#Contract Vehicle by DoD Component and Starting Regime"
    ,"Month of Obligation (6 Month Lagging Average)"
    ,"% of Component Obligations"
    ,Coloration
    ,VehicleUSDATL
    ,NULL
    ,"SignedMonth"
    ,"Obligation.2014"
    ,"Vehicle.sum"
    ,"SubCustomer.component"
    ,"USDATL"
    ,"StartDate"
    ,"EndDate"
    ,MovingAverage=6
    )

VehicleGraph<-VehicleGraph+aes(size=y.variable)
# VehicleGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
VehicleGraph<-VehicleGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
VehicleGraph<-VehicleGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
    theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
    scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year")) 
VehicleGraph
print(VehicleGraph)
#     VehicleGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
    dev.off()
    }

```

```{r VehicleATLpolicy}
VehiclePolicy<-VehicleRegime
VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy<-as.character(VehicleRegime$USDATL)
VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy[VehiclePolicy$USDATL=="CARTER"]<-"CARTER pre-Task\n& Delivery Comp."
VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy[VehiclePolicy$DeliveryCompetition==1]<-"Task &\nDelivery Comp."
VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy[VehiclePolicy$Section863FY09==1]<-"Impl. of\n863-09"
VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy[VehiclePolicy$BBP3==1]<-"BBP3"

VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy<-factor(VehiclePolicy$ATLpolicy,levels=c("GANSLER+",
                                                                 "ALDRIDGE",
                                                                 "WYNNE",
                                                                 "KRIEG",
                                                                 "YOUNG", 
                                                                 "CARTER pre-Task\n& Delivery Comp.",
                                                                 "Task &\nDelivery Comp.",
                                                                 "Impl. of\n863-09",
                                                                 "BBP3" 
                                                                 )
                                ,ordered=TRUE )

ATLpolicyDetails<-data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'GANSLER+',
                             StartDate=as.Date('1997/11/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                             EndDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'ALDRIDGE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2003/05/22' ,format='%Y/%m/%d') ))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'WYNNE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2003/05/23' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2005/06/05' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'KRIEG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2005/06/06' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2007/07/19' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'YOUNG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2007/07/20' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2009/04/26',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'CARTER pre-Task\n& Delivery Comp.',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2010/04/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'CARTER\npre-BBP',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2010/11/02',format='%Y/%m/%d')))

                                                                 
                                                                 
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= "Task &\nDelivery Comp.",
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2010/04/19',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2012/03/01',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP1',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2010/11/03',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2013/04/23',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'WSARA regs',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2011/03/16',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2013/04/23',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= "Impl. of\n863-09",
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2012/03/02',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2014/09/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP2',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2013/04/24',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2014/09/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP3',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2014/09/19',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=max(VehicleRegime$SignedQuarter)))


ATLpolicyDetails$StartFiscalYear<-ymd(paste(year(ATLpolicyDetails$StartDate)+
                                                ifelse(month(ATLpolicyDetails$StartDate)<10,-1,0)
                                            ,"-10-1",sep=""))

VehiclePolicy<-join(VehiclePolicy,ATLpolicyDetails,match="first")
VehiclePolicy<-subset(VehiclePolicy,ATLpolicy!='BBP3') #Not enough to include

VehiclePolicy$Fiscal.Year[VehiclePolicy$Fiscal.Year>VehiclePolicy$EndDate&
                                      VehiclePolicy$SignedMonth<=VehiclePolicy$EndDate]<-
    VehiclePolicy$EndDate[VehiclePolicy$Fiscal.Year>VehiclePolicy$EndDate&
                                      VehiclePolicy$SignedMonth<=VehiclePolicy$EndDate]
VehiclePolicy$SignedFiscal.Year[VehiclePolicy$SignedFiscal.Year<VehiclePolicy$StartDate]<-
    VehiclePolicy$StartDate[VehiclePolicy$SignedFiscal.Year<VehiclePolicy$StartDate]



```

    VehicleGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
        VAR.name="Contract Vehicle"
        ,VAR.proper.name=""#paste(c,"Contract Vehicle by Starting Regime")
        ,VAR.X.label="Month of Obligation (6 Month Lagging Average)"
        ,VAR.Y.label=paste("% of ",c," Obligations")
        ,VAR.Coloration=Coloration
        
        
        ,VAR.long.DF=subset(VehiclePolicy,SubCustomer==c)
        ,VAR.ncol=NA
        ,VAR.x.variable="SignedMonth"
        ,VAR.y.variable="Obligation.2014"
        ,VAR.y.series=    "Vehicle.sum"
        ,VAR.facet.primary="ATLpolicy"
        ,VAR.facet.secondary=NA
        ,"StartDate"
        ,"EndDate"
        ,MovingAverage=6
        )
    
    VehicleGraph<-VehicleGraph+aes(size=y.variable)+scale_size_continuous(name="Constant 2014 $ Obligated, Billions")
    # VehicleGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
    VehicleGraph<-VehicleGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
    VehicleGraph<-VehicleGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
        theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
        scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year"))
    VehicleGraph
    print(VehicleGraph)
    rm(VehicleGraph)
    #     VehicleGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
    while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
        dev.off()
        }
    }
